instruction: Explain how technology is changing the given industry.
output: Technology has changed the banking industry in a number of ways. Banks now offer more digital services such as online banking, mobile banking and digital wallets. This has resulted in convenience for customers and it has allowed banks to reduce costs. Technology has also enabled banks to offer faster, more secure payments and it has enabled banks to process large amounts of data to make better decisions. Additionally, technology has enabled banks to offer personalized services tailored to customer needs.
